title: JC Penny Fairview Highlands
subtitle: A Facebook user, Studio G.C. Penny Portwright, in the Fairview Heights, refused to take a picture with the American flag because she "had gone against their beliefs."
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: "J.C. Penny Portwright Studio at Fairview Heights, Illinois refused to take a picture with an American flag because it went against their faith."
